participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and adventurous, with a deep love for nature and animals.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.personality: Caring and ambitious, always striving to improve herself and support her family.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i am a doctor.

content.text: hello how are you today? i am doing great.
